summary: This FBI 302 report documents the search of Jeffrey Epstein's cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 10, 2019, following his death. The report details the items seized from his cell, including a torn sheet, miscellaneous papers, an MP-3 player, and a piece of fabric described as a 'hand made noose.' It also notes the presence of various law enforcement and medical personnel during the search.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased inmate whose assigned cell in the Special Housing Unit at MCC was searched on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Tijuana
persons.context: Escorted FBI agents and others to Epstein's cell, released clothing from the hospital to an SA, and described a seized item as a 'hand made noose.'

persons.name: Joseph Columbo
persons.context: Brought a piece of fabric (the 'hand made noose') up to L-tier from the MCC 2nd floor medical ward for seizure.

connections.description: As an SIS Lieutenant at MCC, Tijuana escorted officials to and facilitated the search of Epstein's cell following his death.
As a BOP nurse/medic, Columbo handled an item (the 'hand made noose') related to Epstein's case from the medical ward.

events.title: Search of Jeffrey Epstein's MCC Cell
events.description: Law enforcement and medical officials searched Epstein's assigned cell (SHU, L-Tier, Cell 220) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, seizing items including a torn sheet, miscellaneous papers, an MP-3 player, and a 'hand made noose.'

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), 150 Park Row, New York, New York
Special Housing Unit, L-Tier, Cell 220, MCC
keyFacts: The search of Jeffrey Epstein's cell occurred on August 10, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Items seized included a torn sheet, miscellaneous papers, an MP-3 player, and a piece of fabric described by SIS Lieutenant Tijuana as a 'hand made noose.'
The 'hand made noose' was brought to the cell from the MCC medical ward by BOP nurse/medic Joseph Columbo.
Clothing from New York Presbyterian Hospital was released to an FBI Special Agent by SIS Lieutenant Tijuana.
The document is an FBI 302 report drafted on August 13, 2019, documenting the cell search following Epstein's death.
